@graph.description: This is the Profile Crate for EMOBON Sampling crates. It is a RO-Crate that contains a profile.jsonld file that describes the structure of the crate. It also contains a README.md file that describes the profile and provides examples of how to use it.
@graph.identifier: uri here that will redirect to this file
@graph.name: EMOBON Sampling RO-Crate profile

@graph.description: Python library to create/parse RO-Crate (Research Object Crate) metadata.
@graph.name: ro-crate-py
